charges.charge_disposition: Motion to reduce sentence pursuant to 2014 Drug Guidelines Amendment 782 is granted and the defendants previously imposed sentence of imprisonment of 188 months is reduced to 151 months.  ORIGINAL SENTENCE: The defendant plead guilty to Counts 1, 2, 3 and 4 on 11/29/2010 of the Indictment. IMPRISONMENT: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 188 months each on counts 1, 2, 3 and 4, all counts to run concurrently. The Court recommends to the Bureau of Prisons: Upon application, the defendant be allowed to participate in the 500 Hour Substance Abuse Program. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE: Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 5 years each on Counts 1, 2 and 4, and 3 years on count 3, all counts to run concurrently. Standard and additional conditions of release imposed. CRIMINAL MONETARY PENALTIES: MSA: $400.00. No fine or restitution.
